p: 325 g of the powdered leaves was extracted in 1000 ml of 80% (v/v) ethanol for 72 h. The mixture was then filtered on cheese cloth to get the supernatant which was kept in an airtight container and residue that was discarded. The crude extract was obtained from the filtrate by freeze-drying, weighed and kept in an airtight container in the refrigerator. Subsequently, the crude extract was reconstituted with appropriate volume of distilled water and administered to experimental animals.
